alert.note: Alert for White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 2:20PM MST until December 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties above 7,000 ft. * WHEN...From 5 PM Thursday to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially Friday afternoon and evening which is expected to be the period with the most accumulation. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...At this time the heaviest period of snow showers looks to be Friday afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
